Sphinx-tabs
===========

.. tabs::

    .. tab:: Apples

        An apple a day keeps doctor away
    
    .. tab:: Mango

        Found in Summer



.. tabs::

   .. code-tab:: c

         int main(const int argc, const char **argv) {
           return 0;
         }

   .. code-tab:: c++

         int main(const int argc, const char **argv) {
           return 0;
         }

   .. code-tab:: py

         def main():
             return

   .. code-tab:: java

         class Main {
             public static void main(String[] args) {
             }
         }

   .. code-tab:: julia

         function main()
         end

   .. code-tab:: fortran

         PROGRAM main
         END PROGRAM main



.. tabs::

   .. group-tab:: Linux

      Linux Line 1

   .. group-tab:: Mac OSX

      Mac OSX Line 1

   .. group-tab:: Windows

      Windows Line 1

.. tabs::

   .. group-tab:: Linux1

      Linux Line 1

   .. group-tab:: Mac OSX

      Mac OSX Line 1

   .. group-tab:: Windows

      Windows Line 1



.. only:: readthedocs

    This version is the most stable version
